llm_res.rule: The function `transferFrom` should be implemented to allow transferring tokens on behalf of another account after approval.
The function `symbol` should return the symbol of the token.
The function `name` should return the name of the token.
llm_res.function: Incorrect implementation of `name` function (returns empty string)

llm_res: NO. The interface provided does not contain the function `transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success)`.
NO. The interface provided does not contain the function `symbol() public view returns (string)`.
